properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Edisto Beach SC to Savannah GA out 20 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 10 at 3:41PM EST until January 12 at 5:00PM EST by NWS Charleston SC
properties.description:
* WHAT...South winds 10 to 20 kt with gusts up to 25 kt and seas
5 to 8 ft expected.

* WHERE...Edisto Beach to Savannah out 20 NM.

* WHEN...From midnight tonight to 5 PM EST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 5 PM EST SUNDAY
